ti:edition.ti:label: Dialogus de Oratoribus
ti:edition.ti:description: Opera Minora. Tacitus, Cornelius; Furneaux, Henry, editor. Oxford, Clarendon Press. 1900.

ti:translation.ti:label: A Dialogue on Oratory
ti:translation.ti:description: The Agricola and Germany of Tacitus and the Dialogue on Oratory. Tacitus, Cornelius; Church, Alfred John and Brodribb, William Jackson, translators. London, MacMillan and Co. 1877. (Modern Library reprint 1942).
